apdu4j tools and classes

apdu4j provides various utilities for working with real life smart cards and readers, with all the glitches and corner cases.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
apdu4j  
apdu4j.remote  

apdu4j provides various utilities for working with real life smart cards and readers, with all the glitches and corner cases.

Source code is available on Github: https://github.com/martinpaljak/apdu4j

Useful utilities

  • LoggingCardTerminal - wrap this around any CardTerminal to get a useful APDU log
  • SCTool - command line utility, with more documentation on Github
  • TerminalManager - workarounds for broken PC/SC detection, alternative providers etc
  • apdu4j.json.RemoteTerminal - implementation of the remote EMV terminal protocol
  • PinPadTerminal - implementation of CCID pinpads
